results.name: Triangle of Eulerian numbers with rows multiplied by 1 + x.
reference: L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 243.
R. L. Graham, D. E. Knuth and O. Patashnik, Concrete Mathematics. Addison-Wesley, Reading, MA, 1990, p. 254.
J. Riordan, An Introduction to Combinatorial Analysis, Wiley, 1958, p. 215.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..140, flattened
formula: T(n,k) = A123125(n,k) + A123125(n,k+1), with A123125(n,n+1) = 0. - _Franck Maminirina Ramaharo_, Oct 21 2018
mathematica: Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 26 2019, after _Franck Maminirina Ramaharo_ *)
xref: Columns include A000325. Row sums are in A098558.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
